dcterms:creator: K. H. M. R. N. Senavirathna
S. Thalagala
C. K. Walgampaya
dcterms:description: The dataset contains the water distribution network (WDN) data for the Gurudeniya Service Zone in Sri Lanka, which includes information on pipe lengths, nodal demands, and elevations necessary for optimizing the design of the WDN using a Genetic Algorithm.
dcterms:title: Gurudeniya Service Zone WDN Data
